channel.title: Comments on: Weeks Thirteen to Fourteen

item.title: By: Donovan Keele
item.dc:creator: Donovan Keele
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2014/10/weeks-thirteen-to-fourteen/#comment-96818">Eric</a>.
Add me on Facebook, I'd like to chat with you about RX7 stuff.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Eric.

Add me on Facebook, I’d like to chat with you about RX7 stuff.

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2014/10/weeks-thirteen-to-fourteen/#comment-96814">Josh</a>.
So close and yet everything has been at a standstill! This makes the waiting so much more brutal.
Yeah, I haven't checked the forum in a while and it's been raped by spammers. That's what happens when you leave registration open with no authentication, I guess. Going to bring it down and put something new up, maybe.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Josh.

So close and yet everything has been at a standstill! This makes the waiting so much more brutal.

Yeah, I haven’t checked the forum in a while and it’s been raped by spammers. That’s what happens when you leave registration open with no authentication, I guess. Going to bring it down and put something new up, maybe.

item.title: By: Josh
item.dc:creator: Josh
item.description: So close! haha Man the forum is over run with spam! gotta be 50+ random threads!
item.content:encoded:
So close! haha
Man the forum is over run with spam! gotta be 50+ random threads!
